headline: Deckers Outdoor Corporation (DECK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Deckers Outdoor Corporation on Louis’s Substack’s Substack by On the Street With Louis. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DECK. Deckers Outdoor Corporation’s share was trading at $123.67 as of September 3rd. DECK’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.88 and 19.88 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]

headline: How Is Deckers Outdoor Corporation's Stock Performance Compared to Other Consumer Discretionary Stocks?
summary: Deckers Outdoor Corporation has considerably underperformed the Consumer Discretionary industry over the past year, but analysts are cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
